forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High around 65F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 16C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 62F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later at night. Low 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 16C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 60F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 53F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 7C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 44F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High near 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 55F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 57F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 51F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
